If you mean in the first or second episode I think
Megatron was blown clear of the energon at the last
second before shorting out and survived.  Turantulas's
body could survive and his spark was safeguarded in
Black Aracnia.

--- Jonathan <jhogan@...> wrote:
> OOC:
> 
> Megatron did so too at times. And terrantulas.
> Rampage had a good excuse for
> his invulnerability
> 
> And maximals/redicons all share the same design
> specs I assume like
> autobots/decpticons do. While the
> alliegance/personality/look changed from
> bot to bot, faction to faction, the over all design
> specs weren't any
> different.
